verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Search me, oh God.
Let Thy light so shine on me,
That I can see in me,
The things displeasing Thee.
Lead me not, I pray, in any place
That is away from Thy presence;
But let Thy light so shine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For in Thy light I see the light,
For in Thy light no darkness can hide.
I want Thy light to shine on me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Divide the darkness from me,
Until I become Thy light, oh God;
And I will be one with Thee,
For all eternity.
